about_the_game:
Humble Holiday Horrors is a fast-paced point-and-click survival game where you're not only being hunted by colorful caricatures, you also need to manage your own quickly weakening body! Between your stomach, the furnace, and the faulty generator, the tension will quickly ramp up the moment things spiral out of your control!

SYNOPSIS!

Playing as a mere assistant of the totally-not-evil content creator, "Mister Sleep Paralysis," you've been flown up into the Canadian mountains to work remotely from an abandoned military bunker. Sure, there may be some blood-soaked beasts trying to break in during work hours, but all of that overtime spent listening to your boss' scary story narrations weren't for naught. Your will cannot be shaken by such humble horrors!


Imagine the praise your boss will give you when you finish uploading this batch of videos! It's surely worth all of that effort.

GAMEMODES!

Humble Holiday Horrors' is jam-packed with a simple gameplay loop that can be explored through three major modes:

  • Story:
    Contains seven fully illustrated cutscenes taking place over six different levels of escalating threats! The plot takes place from the perspective of Mister Sleep Paralysis' most readily available trusted festive frights and you, their victim. Both parties receive some very, very "supportive" phone calls from your shared superior.

  • Survival:
    An endless mode where each round will offer you one of many brand new modifiers that will either help or hinder you! Between stomach-draining eye contact, emergency furnace igniters, and comically poor rifle aim, the content and difficulty will only stack higher and higher! How far can you go?

  • Sandbox:
    A completely customizable mode where you can choose any assortment of difficulty you want. Though, let's be real, you'll probably just ramp all of the threats up to the max and get your insides torn out.

  • Hard Mode:
    Pink Lemonade included!


And, please, remember to have a happy holidays! (If you're reading this and it isn't the holiday season, please pretend that it is. Thank you!)

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains heavy amounts of cartoonish gore.
